sentence.Network_en: He got into trouble for seducing the daughter of a respectable tradesman.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因为引诱一个有名望的商人的女儿而惹上了麻烦.

sentence.Network_en: Chao Hsin - mei , you scoundrel, you shameless wretch, seducing a married woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 赵辛楣, 你这混帐东西! 无耻家伙!引诱有夫之妇.

sentence.Network_en: Almost on the contrary. I find them very warm and seducing.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎相反, 我觉得它是暖的,而且很诱人.

list.abs: 42. believe the worst in sb 把某人想得很怀43. seduce sb 引诱某人44. testimony 证言（这里指教会活动中的个人演讲，讲述自己对圣经的亲身体验）.

entry.def: If something seduces you, it is so attractive that it makes you do something that you would not otherwise do.

example.ex: The view of lake and plunging cliffs seduces visitors...
example.tran: 湖光旖旎、峭壁峥嵘，游客们被深深吸引了。

example.ex: Clever advertising would seduce more people into smoking.
example.tran: 巧妙策划的广告会引诱更多的人吸烟。

entry.def: If someone seduces another person, they use their charm to persuade that person to have sex with them.

example.ex: She has set out to seduce Stephen.
example.tran: 她已经开始勾引斯蒂芬了。

auth_sentence.content: It is much more exhausting seducing somebody one has known for a long time.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is much more exhausting seducing somebody one has known for a long time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is much more exhausting seducing somebody one has known for a long time.

auth_sentence.content: History books and novels alike aimed at seducing readers through plot and even suspense.
auth_sentence.res_content: History books and novels alike aimed at seducing readers through plot and even suspense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: History books and novels alike aimed at seducing readers through plot and even suspense.
